snippet: The Government Accountability Board unanimously approved the 2012 election to recall the governor and later authorized an investigation into his recall campaign.
abstract: Wisconsin governor and Republican presidential candidate Scott Walker proposes shutting down state's Government Accountability Board, nonpartisan agency that oversees elections, ethics and campaign finance and lobbying; board voted in 2012 to approve election to recall Walker and later authorized investigation into his recall campaign.
lead_paragraph: The Government Accountability Board unanimously approved the 2012 election to recall the governor and later authorized an investigation into his recall campaign.

headline.main: Scott Walker Proposes Shutting Wisconsin Ethics Board
headline.print_headline: Walker Proposes Shutting Wisconsin Ethics Board
